content.text:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

retrieve

Related words are:

- remember
- recover
- bring

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!

content.thinking:
I need to describe the word "retrieve" without using any of these words:
- retrieve (target word)
- remember
- recover
- bring

Let me think about what "retrieve" means:
- To get something back or regain possession
- To fetch something
- To search for and find information
- To get back something that was lost

I should give a concise clue that helps someone guess the word without using any of the forbidden terms.

I could say something like:
- To go and get something that was previously put somewhere
- To fetch information or an object that was stored
- To locate and obtain something that was placed elsewhere
- To access and extract data or items from storage

I need to be careful about words like "get back" which might be too close to "recover" or "bring".

A good clue might be: "When you search for and obtain data from a computer database, you are performing this action."

Or even simpler: "To find and get something that was stored away."

Let me do a final check for any forbidden words:
- My clue doesn't contain "retrieve"
- My clue doesn't contain "remember"
- My clue doesn't contain "recover"
- My clue doesn't contain "bring"

I think this clue works and is concise.

content.text: CLUE: When you search for and obtain data from a computer database, you're performing this action. You might also do this with a ball that your dog fetched and left somewhere.

clem_player.response: CLUE: When you search for and obtain data from a computer database, you're performing this action. You might also do this with a ball that your dog fetched and left somewhere.

content.text:
You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to guess a target word that another player describes to you.

You can make one guess at each trial. You win when you guess the target word. You lose when you cannot guess it in 3 tries.

After each trial you will get a new hint from the other player which starts with CLUE.

Make your guesses by just saying the word using the following form: GUESS: <a word>

Let us start.


CLUE: When you search for and obtain data from a computer database, you're performing this action. You might also do this with a ball that your dog fetched and left somewhere.

content.thinking:
Let me think about this clue carefully:

"When you search for and obtain data from a computer database, you're performing this action."
This part sounds like the word is related to database operations or data retrieval. Words that come to mind include: search, query, retrieve, fetch, access, extract, download, etc.

"You might also do this with a ball that your dog fetched and left somewhere."
This second part suggests that this same word applies to physically getting an object that has been left somewhere. From the options I thought of above, "retrieve" and "fetch" seem to fit this description.

Between "retrieve" and "fetch", "fetch" seems more commonly used both in computer contexts ("fetching data") and when talking about getting a ball that a dog left somewhere ("fetch the ball"). So my guess is "fetch".

I'll submit "fetch" as my guess.

content.text:
I need to guess a word based on the clue about retrieving data from a database and also getting a ball your dog left somewhere.

GUESS: retrieve

clem_player.response:
I need to guess a word based on the clue about retrieving data from a database and also getting a ball your dog left somewhere.

GUESS: retrieve
